name: Local Image
desc: All processing happens on your device - nothing is uploaded to the internet
suggestion: Have feedback or feature requests? Let us know!
drag_drop_or_click: Drop files here or click to browse
base64_desc: Convert between images and Base64 encoding - Local processing, privacy protected
supported_formats: Supports JPG, PNG, GIF, WebP formats
base64_result_placeholder: Base64 result will be displayed here
image_preview_placeholder: Image preview will be displayed here
usage_image_to_base64: Image → Base64: Upload image file, automatically convert to Base64 encoding
usage_base64_to_image: Base64 → Image: Paste Base64 string, convert to previewable and downloadable image
usage_local_processing: All conversions are completed in your browser, no upload to server
usage_supported_formats: Supports common image formats: JPG, PNG, GIF, WebP, etc.
animation_desc: Compose multiple images into WebP or GIF animations - Local processing, privacy protected
image_tools_desc: Powerful local image processing tools that protect your privacy
compress_desc: Efficiently compress images to reduce file size
no_valid_files_download_alert: No valid files found for download. Please check if files are properly compressed.
gradient_generator_desc: Create beautiful CSS gradients with Tailwind output
codec_tools_desc: Encoding and decoding utilities for developers
codec_overview_desc: Comprehensive encoding and decoding tool collection, supporting multiple format conversions, protecting your data privacy with all processing done locally
codec_base64_desc: Base64 encoding and decoding for binary data text representation
codec_url_desc: URL encoding and decoding to handle special characters in URLs
codec_html_desc: HTML entity encoding and decoding to prevent XSS attacks
codec_unicode_desc: Unicode escape sequence encoding and decoding
codec_hex_desc: Hexadecimal encoding and decoding to view byte representation of data
codec_binary_desc: Binary encoding and decoding to view bit representation of data
codec_jwt_desc: JWT token parsing to view Header, Payload and Signature
codec_local_processing_desc: All encoding/decoding operations are completed locally in your browser, protecting data privacy
codec_high_speed_desc: Real-time encoding/decoding, no waiting, supports large text processing
codec_comprehensive_formats_desc: Supports common encoding formats to meet various development needs
codec_easy_to_use_desc: Clean interface design, one-click copy, quick to get started
codec_input_placeholder: Enter text to encode or decode...
codec_base64_explanation_1: • Base64 is an encoding method that represents binary data using 64 printable characters
codec_base64_explanation_2: • Commonly used to transmit binary data in text protocols, such as email attachments, HTTP transmission, etc.
codec_base64_explanation_3: • The encoded data size is approximately 133% of the original data
codec_base64_explanation_4: • Supports Unicode characters and can handle multi-byte characters like Chinese
codec_url_explanation_1: • URL encoding (percent encoding) converts special characters in URLs to safe format
codec_url_explanation_2: • Spaces become %20, & becomes %26, Chinese characters are encoded as UTF-8 byte sequences
codec_url_explanation_3: • Used to ensure URLs are correctly transmitted and parsed across different systems
codec_url_explanation_4: • Commonly used in form submissions, API request parameters, etc.
codec_html_explanation_1: • HTML encoding converts special characters to HTML entities to prevent XSS attacks
codec_html_explanation_4: • Used to safely display user input content in HTML
codec_page_description_base64: Convert text to Base64 encoding or decode Base64 back to original text
codec_page_description_url: Encode or decode special characters in URLs for safe transmission
codec_page_description_html: Convert HTML special characters to entities or vice versa for security
codec_unicode_explanation_1: • Unicode escape sequences use \uXXXX format to represent Unicode characters
codec_unicode_explanation_2: • Only encodes non-ASCII characters (code point > 127), ASCII characters remain unchanged
codec_unicode_explanation_3: • Commonly used in JSON strings, JavaScript code, and configuration files
codec_unicode_explanation_4: • Ensures text displays correctly in any encoding environment
codec_page_description_unicode: Convert non-ASCII characters to Unicode escape sequences (\uXXXX) or reverse
codec_hex_explanation_1: • Hexadecimal encoding converts text to hexadecimal representation of bytes
codec_hex_explanation_2: • Each byte is represented as two hexadecimal digits (0-9, A-F)
codec_hex_explanation_3: • Commonly used in debugging, data analysis, and low-level programming
codec_hex_explanation_4: • Useful for viewing the exact byte representation of text data
codec_page_description_hex: Convert text to hexadecimal representation of bytes or decode hex back to text
codec_binary_explanation_1: • Binary encoding converts text to binary representation of bytes
codec_binary_explanation_2: • Each byte is represented as 8 binary digits (0 and 1)
codec_binary_explanation_3: • Educational tool for understanding how computers store text data
codec_binary_explanation_4: • Useful for bit-level analysis and computer science education
codec_page_description_binary: Convert text to binary representation of bytes or decode binary back to text
codec_jwt_explanation_1: • JWT (JSON Web Token) is a compact, URL-safe means of representing claims
codec_jwt_explanation_2: • Consists of three parts: Header, Payload, and Signature
codec_jwt_explanation_3: • Commonly used for authentication and information exchange
codec_jwt_explanation_4: • This tool helps you decode and inspect JWT token contents
codec_page_description_jwt: Parse and decode JWT tokens to view Header, Payload, and Signature information
